Hellplague:
 
"I couldn't erase his memory, only software.  Who ever created this body for him must have reformatted his memory core, it's heavily encrypted and the data is so inter connected, simply erasing anything would turn him into a protoform.  It would erase everything.  But don't worry, I modified his behavior, we won't have any problems with him, even if he can get past the block I put on them."
The Sweep commande pulled Malice to were he was siting up, and pulled one arm around her shoulders.  She pulled him to the edge of the table and waited Blacknightmare to get his other side.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
BlackNightmare:

"To a bed..."said the femme"Did you erase and modified his memories?"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Hellplague:
>  
> She put in Blacknightmare's suggestion and was ready to transfer 
the program into the bounty hunter.  She downloaded the program into 
Malice, making sure all of it went in.  She then took steps to 
reactivate him.
> "From my scans, it will take at least an hour for him to fully re- 
activate, since he lost all his built up energy reserve."
> The crane arm over the table lifted back into the ceiling, and the 
gel drained from the tank.  The sides of the tank slid back 
underneth the table and Malice lie there, soaked and barely alive.
> "Should we leave him like this or move him to a more comfortable 
bed?"
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> BlackNightmare:
> 
> "Loyal to unicron in in spite of hislife?"said the femme
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Hellplague:
> >  
> > "Not really.  It was just a way to get on the boys' nerves.  
Just 
> because our master made us all doesn't mean we have to like them.  
> Boys are toys," the sweep commander said as she looked over her 
> shoulder at the monitor.  A few more minutes, then she could make 
> the magic work on the sleeping monster.  Hellplague suddenly threw 
> an arm around around Blacknightmare's shoulders.
> > "Sisters need to stay together.  Come on, we can start on his 
> brainwashing, then when we're done we can transfer it into him."
> > Hellplague walked to the console and began typing.
> > "Obey Unicron, Hellplague, and Blacknightmare above all else.  
> Destroy all who oppose Unicron.  Obey your masters without 
> question.  Anything else before I put it with the rest of the 
> brainwash program?"
> > 
> > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > BlackNightmare:
> > 
> > "Are you shure that you like share this pet with me, 
> > Hellplague????"said the femme"I thought that you hated me"
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley 
<bustercross365@y...> 
> > wrote:
> > > Hellplague:
> > >  
> > > "If I can't scan him externally, then I'll access his data 
> > network.  That way I can actvate him and brainwash him while he 
is 
> > offline."
> > > The probe was replaced with a multi interface data link.  It 
> moved 
> > down into the gel and opened his chest panel.  The t- rex head 
on 
> > his chest lifted and opened, revealing the curcuitry inside.  
The 
> > interface connected and Hellplague went to the computer again.  
> She 
> > began accessing his core memory, as well as his software.  
> > > "OOOOh, someone has put heavy restrictions on him.  He is 
> actually 
> > more powerful than what we saw!"
> > > She set the computer to work, trying to unlock the 
restrictions 
> on 
> > his power absorbtion, his EPS grid, and his anti grav core.
> > > "It will take a few minutes, but once the computer is done, we 
> can 
> > begin the brainwashing proceedure."
> > > he swep commander walked over to the table and stuck one hand 
> into 
> > the gel.  She carressed the seemingly soft face of the bounty 
> > hunter, and grinned more.
> > > "I always wanted an obediant pet.  If you want, we may share 
> him, 
> > just us two?" Hellplague said with her grin plastered on her 
face.
> > 
> >
